entity.fieldTitle: Tools to help you manage your health if you're registered as a patient in a VA health facility

fieldLink.title: Refill and track your VA prescriptions

entity.fieldLinkSummary: Order a prescription refill and track your shipment online.
Communicate privately with your VA health care team through Secure Messaging.

fieldLink.title: Schedule and view your VA appointments

entity.fieldLinkSummary: Find out how to schedule an appointment by phone, online, or through Secure Messaging.

fieldLink.title: View your VA lab and test results

entity.fieldLinkSummary: View, download, and print your lab and test results.

fieldLink.title: Order hearing aid batteries and prosthetic socks

entity.fieldLinkSummary: Order these items online for home delivery.

fieldLink.title: Get your VA medical records (also called "VA Blue Button")

entity.fieldLinkSummary: Set up your personal health record and download reports to share with your VA and non-VA health care providers.
